    • Method Detail

      • checkForWall

        public boolean checkForWall​(com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 pos,
                            com.badlogic.gdx.math.GridPoint2 move)
        A method that looks through the respective ID's from the tileset, for relevant walls for the robot as it tries to move.
        Parameters:
        move - GridPoint2 with steps in x and y direction.
        pos - GridPoint2 position of the robot.
        Returns:
        True if it finds a wall that corresponds to a wall in x or y direction that blocks the robot.
